message: ...Waking up the next day is miserable.
My body feels like lead and everything aches.
After a while, I finally manage to sit up.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ouch..."
My face throbs from the beating Mink gave me. I can tell the insides of my cheeks are cut.
Hell, even my guts hurt. It feels like a fire swept through my body.
Yesterday...
That's the last thing I want to think about.
But it's strange... I actually feel a little better.
I let it all out. All the fear and frustration I was keeping bottled up.
I just laid it all out there... while Mink was tormenting me.
It's kinda ironic to think that Mink's forcing it out of me made me feel better in the end.
What the hell does he even want with me anyway?
It gives me goosebumps when I remember him whispering orders into my ear.
He told me to unleash the thing hiding inside me.
What would have happened... if I'd done what he asked?
Can Mink see it? The part of me even I don't know?
...Come to think of it, Mink must've carried me to bed.
I would have expected him to just leave me there when he was done with me. So why?
I felt something like this before, when I saw him interacting with his guys from Scratch.

Most of the time, he's just violent and selfish... but sometimes...
I just don't know.
I slowly get out of bed and start up Ren.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Morning, Ren."

name: 蓮
message: "Good morning, Aoba. Your condition seems poor. Are you alright?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah, I'm fine."
I force a smile in response to Ren's question and drag myself out of the room.
I want to get a shower first.
Mink's seed is still inside me, and the sensation of it oozing down my thighs is disgusting.
I leave the bedroom with Ren and head downstairs.
